TypeSignature.Value: public delegate bool ComposeDelegate(UnicodeFunctions ufuncs, uint a, uint b, out uint ab);
.class public auto ansi sealed ComposeDelegate extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: The first Unicode code point to compose.
The second Unicode code point to compose.
When this method returns, contains the composed Unicode code point.
Docs.summary: A callback delegate used to compose two Unicode code points into a single code point using Unicode canonical composition.
Docs.returns: if the code points were successfully composed; otherwise, .
